long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of buying fast fashion? Do you hate when you buy a new dress at Shein or Zara, only to have it completely fall apart after 2 washes and have to throw it away?

The Mend is on a mission to eliminate fast fashion. We want to help you buy better quality clothes that are meant to last you years and years. We've built an extension that uses AI to find sustainable, better quality clothing alternatives to products from Zara and Shein. We save you dozens of hours trying to discover and vet new brands from social media or search platforms. We do the hard work of curating brands that meet our benchmarks of sustainability based on materials, sourcing, and production, then provide you with the most relevant matches. 

How to use: 
1. Download the extension.
2. Shop for products on Zara and Shein's websites.
3. Click the 'Extensions' icon in your google toolbar.
4. Login with your google account.
5. Click to get started finding your matches!

Our product currently works on products from Zara and Shein, but feel free to email us at info@themend.io to include more references websites.
